text: 📄✨ Added a new FAQ page with practical Rust raiding tips (fast sulfur farming, C4 vs Rockets, smelting). Linked in the header as “FAQ”. Minor UI and accessibility polish.
🎨 Visual Update — New Rust-themed UI (dark industrial palette, orange accents).
🧮 Improved materials summary layout on mobile.
⚙️ Performance tweaks and minor bug fixes.
🔧📦 Added support for new features including updates to Rust tools and materials.
